content: Era un tipo affascinante, spavaldo, intelligente e arricciato, che aveva visto mezzo mondo e poteva parlare di quello che aveva visto.
translations: eng:He was a dashing, swaggering chap, smart and curled, who had seen half the world and could talk of what he had seen
